City DonaldsonvilleHRC-#1 -- Prop.#1-HRC Amend.Art.IV Sec4-08 -City Coun.
Race.SummaryText:
Proposition No. 1
(Charter Amendment)

Summary:  Amendment to Article IV, Section 4-08 to delete paragraphs A through I to eliminate the civil service system for City employees other than fire department employees.
Race.FullText: Shall the City of Donaldsonville Home Rule Charter, Article IV, Section 4-08 be amended by deleting paragraphs A through I to eliminate the civil service system for City employees other than fire department employees?

Race.SpecificTitle: City DonaldsonvilleHRC-#2 -- Prop.#2-HRC Amend.Art.V Sec5-04 -City Coun.
Race.SummaryText:
Proposition No. 2
(Charter Amendment)

Summary:  Amendment to Article V, Section 5-04 to reflect the state statutes and current accounting practices.
Race.FullText: Shall the City of Donaldsonville Home Rule Charter, Article V, Section 5-04 be amended to reflect the state statutes and current accounting practices, as further described in the proposed changes set forth in Resolution No. 0835 of 2008 of the Council of the City of Donaldsonville, State of Louisiana?

Race.SpecificTitle: E. Ascension Con.GDD No.1 -- 5.0 Mills - BOC - 10 Yrs.
Race.SummaryText:
East Ascension Consolidated Gravity Drainage District No. 1 Proposition

Summary: Continuation of the 5.0 mills property tax within the East Ascension Consolidated Gravity Drainage District No. 1 of the Parish of Ascension, Louisiana, for the purpose of providing funds to pay the operation and maintenance costs and expenses of said Gravity Drainage District's drainage works.
Race.FullText: Shall the East Ascension Consolidated Gravity Drainage District No. 1 of the Parish of Ascension, Louisiana (the "District"), under the provisions of Article VI, Sections 30 and 32 of the Louisiana Constitution of 1974, as amended, and other constitutional and statutory authority, be authorized to continue to levy and collect, and adopt an ordinance providing for such levy and collection, of a special ad valorem tax of 5.0 mills on the dollar of assessed valuation on all property subject to taxation within the boundaries of the District (the "Tax") (an estimated $2,804,000 is reasonably expected at this time to be collected from the levy of the Tax for an entire year), for a period of ten (10) years, beginning with the tax collection for the year 2009 and annually thereafter to and including the year 2018, and shall the proceeds of said Tax (after paying the reasonable and necessary expenses of collecting and administering the Tax) be used entirely and exclusively to provide funds to pay the operation and maintenance costs and expenses of the drainage works of the District?
